name: EKLAVYA BIOTECH PVT LTD

idea:
Monedo Financial Services Private Limited is a RBI registered Non-Banking Finance Company. Monedo is where the consumer finance and tech brains come together. Our unique proprietary scoring technology and digital lending process, allows our customers and partners receive offers and pay-outs in 24 hours. We believe lending needs to get less complicated, more flexible, offer more choice, and make customers’ lives easier. That is why we created an alternative to the conservative/conventional lending model, giving customers and merchants multiple offers, anytime, all in one place.

Team Monedo has a unique business proposition for small and mid-sized merchants wherein merchants participate in credit risk, including up to 10% cash collateral for exposures originated from them. Our digital financing is a modernized take on the checkout process. Our end to end solutions are a win-win for all; partners benefit from higher conversion rates, and customers finance their purchases in minutes.

 

Monedo Financial Services received the first of its kind Digital License from RBI  in October 2018 . The firm since then has gained ground in India providing consumer durable & point of sale loans to salaried and self employed individuals.
name: MONEDO FINANCIAL SERVICES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Prescrip is a health-tech company focused on bringing efficiency in healthcare. Our solutions are extremely simple and intuitive that help our doctors treat more patients in less time.
name: PRESCRIP HEALTH TECHNOLOGY LLP

idea:
EAZYBILL is Billing software for small businesses which helps businesses to maintain Accounting / Inventory/ Taxes/ Billing/ Payroll automatically, where user purely focuses on Billing.


Below are features:


BASIC FEATURES

1. INVENTORY CONTROL

Extensive database to help organize and manage even large/complex inventories

Helps you to manage and count inventory. It allows you to create product descriptions, track purchase orders, track invoice orders, and optimize inventory.

2. POINT OF SALE

Adaptable to most any retail or wholesales business operation

Easy to use and flexible to save you time and make you look good in front of your customers. Track customers, deposits, layaways, and orders.

3. CUSTOMER RELATIONS MANAGEMENT (CRM)

Unique flexible features for growing businesses

CRM helps you keep track of customers. It tracks details about the customer like contact information, manage purchases and service history.

4. MULTIPLE BUSINESS MANAGEMENT

You can track multiple businesses from one single database.

This feature enables you to manage businesses that have two locations or single location but do most of their work from one office.

It helps you to have separate reports, payments/ receipts handling and taxes.

5. ACCOUNTING

Manage your finance and bank transactions easily to access reports anytime.

6. REPORTING

Access to real-time information about your business is always available.

You’ll know what items are selling, who the big spenders are, and how your business is growing.

7. SECURITY

Software is offline, so no worries of online data logging.

User Roles can be defined,so that only you can track the complete business.

8. GST INTEGRATIONS

Back dated billing with applicable GST rates for that billing period.

Inbuild government HSN database for all Goods.

GSTR reports (GSTR1 compitable with Government GST offline tool and GSTR3)

Easily configurable GST rates and slabs with different CGST, SGST configurations without any software update

ADDITIONAL FEATURES

1. CARDPAYMENT CREDIT / DEBIT CARD PROCESSING

Simply adding customer’s credit card details to complete a transaction through Payment Gateway.

2. GIFT CARD/LOYALTY MANAGEMENT

Issue a free gift card for your loyal customers and reward them on every purchase.

Assign and track gift card customers to increase sales and gain customer satisfaction.

3. BAR CODE INTEGRATED

You can speed up your point of sale and inventory control with receipt printers,

barcode scanners, label printers, touch screens, and card readers.

4. MANUFACTURING

cutomizations available on manufacturing process into system as per customer requirement.

Track all the manufacture processing till the furnished product to sell.

5. TALLY INTEGRATIONS

Data from application can be sent to TALLY on just one click

Data can be sent With INVENTORY or without INVENTORY as per customer requirement
name: 9FINITE SOLUTIONS

idea:
For women, by women, Candyskin is an Indian intimate apparel brand started by Richa Kalra & Riya Kalra under their partnership firm RVK started in 2017, currently selling in 150 stores pan India and 15 online marketplaces. Creating sexy, functional, comfortable, great fitting styles with an x-factor at affordable prices of international quality. Inspired by the international benchmark and global aspiration of lingerie we stand for luxury, quality and comfort at its finest and want to create an Indian brand that Indian women can resonate with.


Our products are designed in-house by our creative team, keeping in mind the Indian style, body type, weather etc. After spending months on research and development we carefully curate and create fashion forward designs that are not in the market and the final product has the functionality and technology that has been created only by Candyskin. With the perfect fabric, each collection is made basis the season thus our products not only give the perfect fit, lift and comfort but also match the weather conditions. Each product goes through a step-by-step process from the beginning till the end.


We want to ensure that your Candyskin is not just innerwear for you, but it becomes your second skin. The perfect combination of trend and comfort, Candyskin lingerie not only gives you the oomph factor our products give you a 24 hour comfort making you feel comfortable in your own skin.


We aim for all Candyskin women to forget all their inhibitions and feel delicious every moment. Wear your own skin!
name: Candyskin - Lingerie Brand By Women

idea:
Wires. The company has its registered & factory office in the same premises.

Everest Wire is emerging as the new prominent supplier of Stainless Steel Fine Wire in Indian Market. We offer Stainless Steel in Austenitic, Martensitic Grades. Everest Core strength lies in its ability to meet customer’s unique requirements. Our fully integrated facilities enable us to produce Stainless Steels fine wires with various modified chemistries for customer specific applications.

With ever changing market dynamics, Everest wire is equipped to provide customized products and services for global markets, for volume as well as for specialty niche market requirements.

At Everest wire we have a fully automated and computerized manufacturing facility wherein we manufacture Best Quality stainless steel fine wires We are backed by a team of skilled and experienced employees and our industrial expertise enables us to offer our valuable customers a comprehensive and extensive array of Stainless Steel Fine Wire ranging from 0.10 mm to 0.90 mm (0.004“ to 0.035”). Our wires are corrosion resistant too and have a bright finish. As one of the most prominent stainless steel wire manufacturers, we ensure that the entire manufacturing process is in accordance to the international industrial standards and norms.

Wire are Supplied in Sizes from 0.10 mm to 1.00 mm in various grades & finish
name: EVEREST WIRE INDUSTRIES
